title: Doping fluoride into ternary FeCoNi hydroxide electrocatalysts to boost oxygen evolution reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01241K, Communication
Wen-Ju Lu, Tzung-Wen Chiou
A ternary FeCoNi hydroxide-fluoride material by doping fluoride into FeCoNi(OH)x exhibited high OER performance (overpotentials of 243 achieving 100 mA cm−2) and stability in alkaline solution.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
